## SmartContract.deploy() method

Creates a [Transaction](./sdk-core.transaction.md) for deploying the Smart Contract to the Network.

**Signature:**

```typescript
deploy({ deployer, code, codeMetadata, initArguments, value, gasLimit, gasPrice, chainID }: DeployArguments): Transaction;
```
